name: dree
description: A nodejs module wich helps you handle a directory tree providing you its abstraction through tested functions and a custom configuration.

scripts.cover: npm run cover:coveralls && npm run cover:codecov
scripts.docs:html: typedoc --mode library --inputFiles source/lib/index.ts --excludeExternals --excludeNotExported --includeVersion --plugin none --tsconfig source/tsconfig.json --gaID $GA_TOKEN source/lib --out docs/documentation/html
scripts.docs:html-dev: typedoc --mode module --name 'dree - DEV' --includeVersion --plugin none --tsconfig source/tsconfig.json --out docs/documentation/html-dev
scripts.docs:markdown: typedoc --out docs/documentation/markdown --mode library --inputFiles source/lib/index.ts --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --theme markdown --excludeNotExported --excludeExternals --includeVersion source/lib
scripts.docs:deploy: npm run docs:deploy:html && npm run docs:deploy:html-dev
scripts.docs: npm run docs:html && npm run docs:html-dev && npm run docs:markdown && npm run docs:deploy

author: Eugenio Vinicio Berretta <euberdeveloper@gmail.com>
